title: Vanguard V4.0 Encounter Guide
creator: Siaisa

classification.T: Pokemon is recieved via a Trade
classification.F: Pokemon is obtained as a Fossil
classification.E: Pokemon is received as an Egg
classification.#TP: Pokemon is purchased with Trainer Points
classification.D: Pokemon is a reward from a Raid Den
classification.Ch#: Encounter available in a later chapter

notes: Green Areas like Archon Beach are Side Areas which you are not required to visit in the main story.
Every Area has the same encounter rates for all the Pokemon listed. The equation for the encounter rate of each Pokemon being "100/(# of unique encounters)".
Eevee can evolve upon reaching Level 28+ while holding any 'Type Gem' item except the Dragon Gem as a different item is needed for the Dragon Type 'Eeveelution'.
Starter Pokemon can be bought at the lab for Trainer Points upon entering Act 3. (This is not a typo, the ability to purchase them was pushed back an Act compared to Version 3.5).

areas.notes: Entrance is on the east side of Route 8.

areas.name: Rivera Hillside
areas.notes: The Static Pokemon in Mt.Runaan Depths can all be caught earlier so they aren't listed here.

specialEncounters.notes: Litleo's Den can be found in Illusi Cavern which connects Route Ten and Eleven. There are no wild encounters there.

areas.name: Lakeside Island

specialEncounters.notes: Available in Chapter 22. Southwest Corner. From an NPC south of where you speak with Vivi.
Den can be reached from Northeast exit of Illusi Forest.

areas.notes: Can return via an NPC in Rivera Woods Post Chapter 21.

specialEncounters.notes: Chest between ledges on the left side.
Available in Chapter 23.
Head south along a small pathway just after the first trainer you face in Eastcliff Cavern, the exit will lead to an offshoot with the Skull Fossil Item ball.

areas.name: Eastcliff Cavern

specialEncounters.notes: You'll find a wild Bagon in one of the lower levels near an oasis. Interacting with it will cause it to flee, keep chasing it until it appears on one of the upper levels. Upon talking to it again will have it headbutt you to the area where the Den is located.

areas.notes: Boldore is also the sole wild encounter within Eastcliff Gate.

specialEncounters.notes: Item ball up on the path blocked by the Level 80 Alpha Tyranitar.
Available in Chapter 25.
In a small pathway next to the Northeast Cofagrigus statue.
Sold by the trader directly behind the Pokecenter on the next level up in Kirba.

chapters.name: Chapter 25-27
chapters.notes: After Chapter 24 there are no new encounters until the end of Chapter 27.

specialEncounters.notes: Quest is started in Kaedra after starting Chapter 30, in which Nickit will flee to Auburn Highlands.

chapters.name: Post-Chapter 30
chapters.notes: There are no new encounters after Chapter 30 until the end of the current version. Route Seventeen lacks encounters at the time of this guide's creation.

specialEncounters.name: Special Encounter 1 (Druddigon)
specialEncounters.description: If you've managed to find all 20 Data Cables Key Items obtainable thus far you can turn them in to a scientist in Eastcliff. Once you do so you will be rewarded with a Druddigon.

specialEncounters.name: Special Encounter 2 (Lapras)
specialEncounters.description: After the Major Story Events in Arlen you can head to Avaros and enter Frostborne Clearing, upon doing so you will hear a Pokemons cry. By traversing through to the back of the clearing you will encounter Eris' Lapras, where it will battle you. Upon victory you will fittingly recieve Lapras at Level 30. As well as be granted the ability to surf.

specialEncounters.name: Special Encounter 3 (Svetrier/Drukknir)
specialEncounters.description: Once you have beaten Destiny at the end of Act 2, you can head to Rivera and speak to Marshall's mother, once you do head to the northeast corner of Rivera Woods. Upon winning the fight that takes place by Marshall's grave you will have to choose between pursuing Svetrier (Pink) or Drukknir (Gray). You will be able to locate the Pokemon chosen in Illusi Forest.

specialEncounters.name: Special Encounter 4 (Griflet)
specialEncounters.description: After the events atop Mt.Fueterre in Chapter 29, you can head to Marshall's former room at the Guild in Koriko, interact with his dorm door to get the Dark Feather. Then head to Kaedra's Pokemon center and speak with the old man inside. He will give you the Light Feather. Finally, head up to where you fought Darreth atop Mt.Fueterre and you will be able to encounter and catch Griflet.

specialEncounters.name: Special Encounter 5 (Pachirisu)
specialEncounters.description: Upon completing the current story of Version 4.0. You can head to Lavendam Market whereupon you can complete the Side Quest: Trickster. Completion of the quest will reward you with a Pachirisu.
